title: The Silent Echo
synopsis: A sound engineer discovers a frequency that allows him to hear the thoughts of people in his building, leading him to uncover a murder plot.

title: Neon Garden
synopsis: In a city where plants are illegal, a young botanist runs an underground greenhouse that becomes the center of a resistance movement.

title: Canvas of Time
synopsis: A painter discovers that his portraits age instead of his subjects. He falls in love with a woman who begs him to paint her to save her from a terminal illness.
